front.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Guide for Installation, Maintenance and Operation of Irrigation Equipment Located Near or Under Power Lines
front.abstract: The proposed Guide is based on industry practices and presents guidelines for installation, maintenance and operation and of irrigation equipment near or under overhead power lines as they pertain to minimum distance to energized conductors and proper grounding to avoid nuisance shocks. The Guide covers a variety of conditions in general terms. Specific recommendations are made for the type of irrigation systems and power line parameters most commonly found.
